title: Process Order Paid by Purchase Order/Check (B2B)
description: A B2B customer places an order using a purchase order and will pay by check. The order should not be shipped until payment is received.

tasks.description: Create a new order with the payment method set to 'Purchase Order'.
Set the order status to 'Awaiting Payment' and generate an invoice to send to the customer.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent updates the status and generates the invoice.

tasks.description: Once the finance department confirms the check has cleared, update the order status to 'Processing' to release it for fulfillment.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent updates the status, allowing the warehouse to ship the order.
